snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Friday's selection includes items on federal authorities seizing sports Web sites, large companies that do not admit to the S.E.C. that they...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Friday's selection includes items on federal authorities seizing sports Web sites, large companies that do not admit to the S.E.C. that they have been hacked and cellphone peace in wired subway stations.
lead_paragraph: Here are the interesting things that the tech reporters and editors for The New York Times found on the Web on Friday. Find more Scuttlebot items here.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Sports Sites and Companies Hiding Hacking
